Product Description

UNIQUE DESIGN: Fake succulents with fake flowers pots are made of 100% white ceramic with gilt craftsmanship. Succulent Plants Artificial unique modern retro shape plus Purple succulent and simple decoration can make your office space or furniture decoration bright and positive for a happy start to your day
POTTED SUCCULENTS SIZE: The artificial potted plants measure 2.2″ x 2.4″ x 3.3″ (56 x 62 x 85mm). These indoor fake plant decorations are small but super cute. If you want to decorate your office or room with large plants, these cute decorations may not be the best fit
LOCATIONS: Small fake plants are a perfect decorative addition to your desk, living room, bedroom, bathroom, modern home office, dining room, coffee table, side table, wall rack, bookshelf, desk, or TV area. It’s also perfect for a bedside table, window sill, or fireplace
EASY TO CARE FOR: Fake plants do not require much maintenance or care. They will not wither or fade and only need to be gently wiped occasionally using a damp cloth
COME AND HAVE THIS LOVELY SUCCULENT：Adorable succulents are the perfect room decoration for a modern decorative aesthetic. It’s also a perfect purple gifts for women. The elegant and cute plant features a premium texture, and the packaging is made of sturdy pearl cotton to keep the small fake plants in place and prevent damage during transportation

Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Price: $39.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:42:56 UTC – Details)


House training your pet can be simple when utilizing the benefits of the Indoor, Artificial Grass Puppy Pad by PETMAKER. This fake grass bathroom mat and tray is designed to accommodate the potty training needs of puppies, along with the needs of small to medium sized pets that are unable to make it outside for any reason. The portable pet pad and tray system allows your cat or dog to have an acceptable place to relieve themselves, which ensures a cleaner house, apartment, or patio. NOTE: This is an exclusive product of PETMAKER and ONLY Indoor. IMPORTANT: Avoid buying counterfeit products and transacting with unauthorized sellers. Look for our logo on the packaging for every one of our products. PETMAKER is a registered trademark protected by U.S. Trademark law and will be vigorously defended.
DOG GRASS PAD WITH TRAY – This artificial turf dog pee pad provides a sanitary place for your pet to relieve themselves inside or on your balcony or patio. It’s a reusable alternative to disposable dog training pads for small to medium-sized pets.
EASY PUPPY TRAINING – Potty training your new best friend just got easier, even if you live in an apartment or work long hours. This dog grass pad helps avoid accidents while enforcing your pup’s training that they should go potty on grass.
THREE-LAYER SYSTEM – The artificial dog grass mat sits on top of a secure plastic drainage insert that allows liquid to empty into the durable collection puppy pad holder to avoid messes and spills.
EASY CLEAN-UP – Cleaning this reusable grass pad for dogs is quick and easy. Rinse the three layers of the dog potty tray with soapy water and clean-up is complete.
PRODUCT DETAILS – Materials: Synthetic Plastic (Grass Mat) and Hard Plastic (Tray and Insert). Dimensions: (L) 25” x (W) 20” x (H) 1.25”. Color: Green and Black.

Read more

3-Piece System

Synthetic Plastic Grass Mat

Grass mat looks and feels just like real grass while being completely safe and non-toxic for your pet.

Detachable Grid Tray

Holes from the detachable grid tray allows liquid to drain to the bottom base tray, so grass mat is always dry and ready for use.

Bottom Base Tray

Bottom base tray detaches from grid tray for an easy and mess free clean up. Simply rinse and wash with soap and water.

Set Include:

  • Grass Mat
  • Grid Tray
  • Base Tray
  • Dimensions: 20 x 25 x 1.25 inches
  • Indoor and Outdoor Use

Read more

Place potty trainer tray in any room in the house!

Great for apartments or homes with no available yards.

Perfect for any patio, porch, or garage!

Read more

4
Price: $39.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:42:56 UTC – Details)

Product Description

GZWHD

TO BE WITH YOU

GZWHD is committed to creating elegant and delicate jewelry for women. It keeps up with fashion trends and transforms various trend elements into beautiful and practical jewelry to meet the diverse needs of modern women. Fashion design and high quality make GZWHD a popular brand.

Ring

Ring Size ：Adjustable Ring/Open Ring

Main Stone Size :10*14 mm

Stone Material:Cubic Zirconia

Side Stone Size：1 mm

Side Stone Quantity:18 Pieces

Earrings

Weight : 8.6 g

Stone Material:Cubic Zirconia

Side Stone Size：1 mm

Side Stone Quantity:18*2= 36 Pieces

Necklace&Pendant

Main Stone Size :12*16 mm

Stone Material:Cubic Zirconia

Side Stone Size：1.5 mm

Side Stone Quantity:18 Pieces

Chain Length ：

45+5 cm / 17.7″+2″

Bracelet

Weight : 18.2g

Main Stone Size :6*8mm

Main Stone Quantity：16 Pieces

Stone Material:Cubic Zirconia

Side Stone Size：2 mm

Side Stone Quantity:32 Pieces

bracelet Length ：18+3cm/7″+1″

A SPECIAL GIFT FOR A ROMANTIC MOMENT

This teardrop jewelry set is unique and elegant, it is an ideal gift for wife/lover/girlfriend/mother/daughter/friend/sister/bride/bridesmaid and yourself on Anniversaries/Valentine’s Day/Mother’s Day/Birthday/Wedding/Christmas/Thanksgiving Day.

Open/Adjustable Ring

The open ring size can be freely adjusted from size 6 to size 11, you can adjust it until it fits your finger perfectly.

Extended Bracelet

The length of the bracelet is 7 ”(main part) + 1” (extension section, detachable).You can make it fit your wrist by attaching and detaching the extension section freely.

Necklace Introduction

The length of the necklace is 17.7”+2”, This means you can choose any length between 17.7″-19.7″(45cm-50cm).This necklace is attached with a lobster clasp. It is separated from the pendant, and the pendant can be replaced freely.

Sealed Gift Box

We pack and ship each jewelry set in a sealed jewelry box. It is perfect as a gift to send directly to wife/lover/girlfriend/friend/sister/mom/bride/bridesmaid on anniversary/valentine’s day/birthday/mother’s day/Christmas day

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 3.15 x 1.97 x 1.02 inches; 1.59 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ January 4, 2022
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09PNBZTKP

MATERIAL: This jewelry set is platinum plated alloy, nickel-free, lead-free, non-allergic, and highly polished. The main stone is a 12mm*16mm (pendant) and 10mm*14mm (earrings and ring) waterdrop created-ruby, and the side stones are multiple inlaid round cubic zirconia. The bracelet contains 16 oval created-ruby and 32 round white cubic zirconia.
ABOUT SIZE: The size of the open ring can be adjusted from size6 to size11. The length of the necklace is 17.7”+2”(45cm+5cm). The necklace connected by lobster clasp,and it is separated from the pendant, and the pendant can be replaced freely. The length of the bracelet is 7 ”(main part) + 1” (extension section, detachable).
ITEMS YOU WILL GET: A ring, a pair of earrings, a pendant and necklace set, a bracelet, and a gift box.
QUALITY ASSURANCE: These jewelry are brand new, and they will be double-checked before sending, we will check every part of the whole set of jewelry to ensure that they are working properly and without any defects. We provide a 60-day unconditional refund service. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.
